data.title: Lais Ribeiro, horoscope for birth date 5 October 1989, born in Teresina (Piauí), with Astrodatabank biography
data.meta_description: Horoscope and astrology data of Lais Ribeiro born on 5 October 1989 Teresina (Piauí), Brazil, with biography
data.text:
Name

Ribeiro, Lais Gender: F

Birthname Lais Pereira de Oliveira born on 5 October 1989 at 04:30 (= 04:30 AM ) Place Teresina (Piauí), Brazil, 5s0521, 42w4807 Timezone -03 h3w (is standard time) Data source

BC/BR in hand

Rodden Rating AA Collector: Scholfield

Astrology data 12°03' 11°01 Asc. 22°49'

Biography

Brazilian fashion model best known for her work as a "Victoria's Secret Angel" (a photographic and runway model for an American lingerie company).

Prior to becoming a model, Ribeiro was in training to become a nurse. A year after giving birth to her son Alexandre, she gave in to a friend's advice and started working as a model in her native Brazil.

In 2009, she walked the major international catwalks for various famous designers. During the fashion week of Brazil for the spring/summer 2011 collections, Ribeiro was the most booked runway model with 27 shows during São Paulo Fashion Week and 26 shows during Rio Fashion Week.

She has been photographed for American, Brazilian, German, and Italian Vogue, and appeared in ad campaigns for Ralph Lauren, Christian Dior, Tom Ford, GAP and American Eagle.

She appeared in the 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, as well as the 2011 Christmas commercial and the 2012 Valentine's Day commercial. She was scheduled to walk the 2012 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, but fell and severely sprained her ankle during rehearsals.

Ribeiro wore the "Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra" for the 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show held in Shanghai, China on 28 November 2017. The US$2 million bra and its matching belt are handset with 6,000 yellow diamonds, yellow sapphires, and blue topaz in 18 carat gold.

Ribeiro has a son, born on 17 May 2008. In 2014, she began dating American basketball player Jared Homan. They have since parted, and in 2018 she began dating NBA player Joakim Noah. They became engaged in September 2019 at Burning Man.

Link to Wikipedia biography

Relationships

lover relationship with Noah, Joakim (born 25 February 1985). Notes: Engaged

Events

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Source Notes

Birth certificate in hand from Sy Scholfield. Her parents are named as José Ribeiro de Oliveira and Maria do Socorro Pereira de Oliveira. She was born at Casa Mater Dona Evangelina Rosa (Maternity hospital) in Teresina. The certificate was filed on 25 October 1989. Wikipedia has 1990 in error.
